REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits chain restaurants from charging extra for non-dairy alternatives in beverages
Summary: Prohibits chain restaurants from charging extra for non-dairy alternatives in beverages.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting chain restaurants from charging extra for non-dairy alternatives in beverages
